function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High interarrival time leading to fewer patients vaccinated","Impact":"Lower efficiency and slower vaccination process","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce waiting time and increase patient throughput","Technologies":"Queue management systems, appointment scheduling software","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Exceeding layout boundaries","Impact":"Infeasibility of the solution, potential overcrowding, and violation of health and safety regulations","Mitigation":"Redesign the layout to accommodate the maximum number of people allowed and ensure proper spacing","Technologies":"Space optimization software, simulation modeling tools","People":"Architects, facility managers, health and safety regulators","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Overutilization of resources in anamnesis, inoculation, and registration","Impact":"Increased workload on healthcare workers, potential errors, and inefficiencies","Mitigation":"Implement process optimization strategies and resource allocation guidelines","Technologies":"Workflow management systems, process automation tools","People":"Healthcare workers, administrators","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
